index.headline: Pay once and <Styled>split</Styled> between the <Styled>rest</Styled> of the group
index.tagLine: Easily split expenses with friends, family, or colleagues. Using Split.rest, one person pays, and the rest of the group settles up — simple, fair, and hassle-free.
index.mockLightMode: Available in bright colors if you are not the dead inside type
index.mockSplit: Easily view the details of each split, including edit history!
index.mockSplitTypes: Multiple split types to choose from
index.mockRoulette: Never be in doubt who should pay next with the roulette (it's fair, we promise)
index.mockSettleUp: Settle up with a single click. Well, two actually, but who's counting?
index.mockBig: Works great on both small and big screens

completeSplit.payeeUncompletedEntry: {{userName}} has marked their entry in {{splitName}} as not completed

deleteAccount.doYouWantToDeleteAccount: Do you want to delete your account?

invitations.noInvitations: There appear to be no invitations you can access

memberInfo.noSplits: This person has no splits in this group

splitType.selectType: How would you like to split?
splitType.noAllowedMethods: There are no applicable split methods allowed in this group

splitTypeDescription.exactAmounts: Select the participants, choose who paid, and enter how much each person owes.
splitTypeDescription.equalAmounts: Select participants, choose who paid, and split the total equally or assign everyone the same amount. You can adjust values manually afterward.
splitTypeDescription.shares: Select participants, choose who paid, and split the total by shares. You can adjust values manually afterward.
splitTypeDescription.balanceChanges: Select participants and update their balances. Multiple people can have negative balances as long as the total equals zero. Perfect for poker games!
splitTypeDescription.lend: Lend money to other people. You can use this to transfer debts from outside of the group.
splitTypeDescription.delayed: Submit only the paid amount without setting participants. You can finalize the split later.
